title: Immersion
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: immersion-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20255
	- preferred-term:: Immersion
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Subjective experience of psychological engagement and sense of presence within a virtual environment, characterized by reduced awareness of physical surroundings and absorption in virtual context.
	- source:: [[ACM]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:Immersion
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Process
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualProcess
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InteractionDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]], [[PresentationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: immersion-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse Infrastructure]]
		- has-part:: [[Emotional Immersion]]
		- has-part:: [[Sensory Immersion]]
		- has-part:: [[Cognitive Immersion]]
		- requires:: [[Display Technology]]
		- requires:: [[Content Quality]]
		- requires:: [[Interaction Mechanism]]
		- enables:: [[Flow State]]
		- enables:: [[Presence]]
		- enables:: [[User Engagement]]
		- depends-on:: [[Haptic Feedback]]
		- depends-on:: [[Visual Fidelity]]
		- depends-on:: [[Audio Spatialization]]

ontology.definition: Subjective experience of psychological engagement and sense of presence within a virtual environment, characterized by reduced awareness of physical surroundings and absorption in virtual context.
